page.title: 09VILLAGE ORGANISATIONS
page.content: There are quite a few organisations in this area such as Brownies, Guides, Cubs, Mother and Toddlers group, Playgroup and Drama club. The Girl Guides is an organisation for girls and there is an organisation for boys which is Scouts. Brownies and Cubs are for younger children, and Guides and Scouts are for older children. The Youth Club is held in a hut on the school playing field.About 20 children attend the Youth Club at present, all aged 10 years or over. Many different activities take place there. Organisations for adults include Women's Institute, Men's Society, Keep Fit, football and cricket teams. The local pubs have darts, crib, skittles and Quiz teams.
